textContent:
2 ounces applejack, preferably Laird's Bonded Applejack
3 lemon quarters
1/2 ounce demerara syrup (2:1, sugar:water)
3-5 blueberries
small handful of mint
Garnish: mint sprig, three blueberries on a pick

Muddle the lemons, blueberries and mint in a mixing tin.
Add apple brandy and demerara syrup and shake with ice.
Strain into a rocks glass over cracked or Kold Draft ice.
Garnish with a mint sprig and three blueberries on a pick.

https://punchdrink.com/recipes/harvest-smash
title: Harvest Smash
